name: 動力系統理論在運動行為的應用
description: Introducing the basics of dynamical systems theory and provides some applications in the current MB research issues.
goals: Understand the basic concepts of Dynamical Systems Theory
Understand the connections between the Dynamical Systems Theory and the study of motor behavior
The ability to apply the Dynamical Systems Theory to the research of motor behavior
syllabus:
18-week schedule

1.       Introduction to the Dynamical Systems Theory

2.       Basic Concepts of Dynamics

3.       Applications

4.       Limit Sets

5.       Applications

6.       Logistic map

7.       Applications

8.       Midterm Report

9.     Chaos

10.     Applications

11.     Bifurcation

12.     Applications

13.     Dimensional Analyses and Fractal Dimensions

14.     Applications

15.     Ecological Dynamics

16.     Applications

17.     Project Report

18.   Final Examination
